data.current_summary: Get nutrition text for an input string containing food and beverage words.
data.current_description: Returns a list of food item nutrition facts extracted from an input string containing food and beverage words.
data.summary_suggestion: Extract nutrition data from natural language text
data.description_suggestion: Extracts nutrition facts for food and beverage items from natural language text input. Accepts any text containing food or beverage references and returns a structured list of nutrition data including calories, macronutrients, and other nutritional information for each identified item. Requires API key authentication via x-api-key header.
